trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation at http://extension-helpers.readthedocs.io
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见http://extension-helpers.readthedocs.io上的文档。

trans-unit.source: The extension-helpers package includes convenience helpers to assist with building Python packages with compiled C/Cython extensions. It is developed by the Astropy project but is intended to be general and usable by any Python package.
trans-unit.target: 该扩展的帮助程序包中包含的便利帮手来协助建立Python包编译C /用Cython扩展。它是由Astropy项目开发的，但旨在被任何Python包通用和使用。

trans-unit.source: Utilities for building and installing packages in the Astropy ecosystem
trans-unit.target: 用于在Astropy生态系统中构建和安装软件包的实用工具。
